# reflection

**Instance Property**

Provides access to this compute pipeline’s reflection.

## Declaration

```swift
var reflection: MTLComputePipelineReflection? { get }
```

## Discussion

Reflection is `nil` if you create the pipeline state object directly from the [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLDevice] protocol.
title: reflection
